summary: A pair of whacked-out cartoon-like exterminator/hitmen kill the owner of a burglar-alarm company, and stalk the partner who hired them, his wife, and a nerd framed for the murder, who tells the story in flashback from the electric chair.
cast: Louise Lasser|Paul L. Smith|Brion James|Sheree J. Wilson|Edward R. Pressman|Bruce Campbell|Reed Birney|Richard Bright|Antonio Fargas|Hamid Dana|John Hardy|Emil Sitka|Hal Youngblood|Sean Farley|Richard DeManincor|Carrie Hall|Wiley Harker|Julius Harris|Ralph Drischell|Robert Symonds|Patrick Stack|Philip A. Gillis|Bridget Hoffman|Anne Cooper|Frances McDormand|Carol Brinn|Matthew Taylor|Perry Mallette|Chuck Gaidica|Jimmie Launce|Joseph French|Ted Raimi|Dennis Chaitlin|Ethan Coen|Joel Coen|Julie Harris|Dan Nelson|Rob Tapert
title: Crimewave (Ola de cr√≠menes... ola de risas)
